Flying, first strike
[i]In her Shadow[/i] – Whenever Severa, Paragon's Daughter attacks with another creature with flying, you may have creatures you control with flying have base power and toughness equal to the greatest power and toughness among creatures you control with flying until end of turn.
[i]Pair Up[/i] – Whenever Severa attacks a player, if exactly one other creature is attacking that player, exile the top two cards of your library. You may play them for as long as they remain exiled.
